content:
Action:4

I'm moving up, expecting the avatar to shift from (7,1) to (6,1) and start our upward progress toward the exit at (1,11).

Action:2

I'm moving right from (6,1) to (6,2) to progress toward the exit while maintaining a safe path away from walls and hazards.

Action:2

I’m moving right from (6,2) to (6,3) to reposition and begin finding a corridor towards the exit, while avoiding immediate hazards.

``` Action:2 ```
I'm pushing right from (6,3), expecting to move into (6,4) by pushing the box aside toward (6,5), which advances me closer to the exit at (1,11) while avoiding dangerous holes.

Action:2

I'm pushing right from (6,4) to move the box at (6,5) forward into (6,6), expecting to open a passage toward a route that will eventually help me reach the exit.

Action:2

I'm moving right from (6,5) to push the box at (6,6) into (6,7), which starts opening a path toward the exit.

Action:4

I'm moving UP from (6,6) because the cell above at (5,6) is clear, which should start my route toward the exit at (1,11).

Action:2

I'm moving right expecting to push the box from (5,7) into (5,8), so my avatar advances toward a clearer path for eventually heading upward to reach the exit.

Action:2

I'm pushing the adjacent box to the right (from (5,8) to (5,9)) to clear a path that might allow me to navigate upward toward the exit.

Action:4

I'm moving up from (5,8) to (4,8) to continue a safe path toward the exit while avoiding the boxes and holes, aligning with the overall strategy.

Action:4

I'm moving UP to push the box above and clear my path, expecting the box to bounce upward out of the way so I can continue heading toward the exit.

Action:3

I'm moving down from (3,8) toward a clearer path, expecting the avatar to advance one cell to (4,8) and open up new options for reaching the exit.

Action:2

I'm pushing the box at (4,9) right into the free space at (4,10), which should allow my avatar to advance toward a path leading to the exit, and I'll check that the push worked as expected.

Action:1

I am moving the avatar left from (4,9) to the free floor at (4,8) to open up space and look for a safer route, hopefully setting up a path towards the exit at (1,11).

Action:4

I'm moving UP from (4,8) to (3,8) to begin advancing toward the exit, expecting that this safe open cell will let me reposition to push or bypass obstacles ahead.

Action:3

I'm moving downward from row3, col8 to row4, col8 since it's a clear floor spot, expecting my avatar to advance safely toward a path that might lead to the exit.

Action:2

I'm moving right from (4,8) to (4,9) to approach the box at (4,10) so I can push it out of the way and eventually progress toward the exit at (1,11).

Action:1

I'm moving the avatar left from (4,9) to (4,8) to better position it to advance upward toward the exit, aligning with the planned safe route.

Action:4  
I'm moving the avatar up from (4,8) to (3,8) to start heading toward the exit, and I expect the move to complete without unintended rotations.

Action:4

I'm moving UP from (3,8) to (2,8), which pushes the box from (2,8) upward into the free cell (1,8), steering me closer to the exit at (1,11) while clearing the path.

Action:3

I moved the avatar down from (2,8) to (3,8) to access a clear floor, aiming to navigate around the boxes and proceed toward the exit.

```Action:4```

Action:2

I’m pushing right so the box at (2,9) moves into (2,10) and the avatar advances to (2,9), which will help progress toward the exit at (1,11).

Action:4

I am moving upward from (2,9) to (1,9) to progress toward the exit at (1,11), and I expect the avatar's position to update accordingly.

Action:2

I'm moving the avatar one step to the right, expecting to advance onto the clear floor at (1,10) on our path toward the exit at (1,11).

Action:2

I'm moving right so the avatar reaches the exit at (1,11), which should trigger the win condition.
